<title level="1" right="Rules">[Tattooing Rules](/Rules.aspx?ID=1496)</title>

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 164 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
To craft a magical tattoo, you must be able to craft magic items and have a specialty in tattooing. You can attain these requirements by taking the [Tattoo Artist](/Feats.aspx?ID=2962) skill feat, or you can take both the [Magical Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=812) and [Specialty Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=844) skill feats, choosing artistry as your specialty.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
